title: Katagami Textile Stencil (1 of 2) with Flowering Plant Design
dimensions:
paper: H. 25.5 x W. 42.4 cm (10 1/16 x 16 11/16 in.)
pattern unit dimensions: H. 25.5 x W. 42.4 cm (10 1/16 x 16 11/16 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Museum Collection
medium: One of a pair of koban (small-sized) sheets of minogami (mulberry bark paper) treated with persimmon juice and cut using the "tsukibori" (thrust-carving) technique
